text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking poor with 4 ft @8s WSW swell, but fresh 23 mph SW winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow, the swell remains at 4 ft @8s SE, with winds picking up to 27 mph ESE, keeping conditions messy. Day after, the swell jumps to 9 ft @10s W, but strong 33 mph SSW winds will make it challenging. Best: day after.
